title: Former Democratic candidate Pillot endorses Republican McCaffrey for Lockport mayor
text:
Published By: Buffalow News: Politics - Today 
LOCKPORT – Michael J. Pillot, the Democratic candidate for mayor in 2007 and 2011 who lost the party’s primary last month, endorsed Repu...
